00052     SceneManager::SceneManager(SceneManager::SceneManagerType ManagerType)
00053     {
00054         Ogre::SceneType Type;
00055         switch (ManagerType)
00056         {
00057             case Generic:
00058                 Type = Ogre::ST_GENERIC;
00059                 break;
00060             case Exterior:
00061                 Type = Ogre::ST_EXTERIOR_FAR;
00062                 break;
00063             case ExteriorRealFar:
00064                 Type = Ogre::ST_EXTERIOR_REAL_FAR;
00065                 break;
00066             case Interior:
00067                 Type = Ogre::ST_INTERIOR;
00068                 break;
00069             default:
00070                 Type = Ogre::ST_GENERIC;
00071         }
00072         OgreManager = Ogre::Root::getSingleton().createSceneManager(Type);
00073     }
00074 
00075     SceneManager::~SceneManager()
00076     {
00077         Ogre::Root::getSingleton().destroySceneManager(OgreManager);
00078         for( unsigned int x=0 ; x < Lights.size() ; x++ )
00079         {
00080             delete Lights[x];
00081         }
00082         for( unsigned int x=0 ; x < Particles.size() ; x++ )
00083         {
00084             delete Particles[x];
00085         }
00086         for( unsigned int x=0 ; x < Nodes.size() ; x++ )
00087         {
00088             delete Nodes[x];
00089         }
00090     }
00091

00094     }

00098     }

00100     void SceneManager::CreateSkyPlane(Plane& SkyPlane, String& Material, String& Group, Real Scale, Real Tiling, bool DrawFirst, Real Bow, int XSegments, int YSegments)
00101     {
00102         this->OgreManager->setSkyPlane(true, SkyPlane.GetOgrePlane(), Material, Scale, Tiling, DrawFirst, Bow, XSegments, YSegments, Group);
00103     }

00106     {
00107         this->OgreManager->setSkyPlane(false, Ogre::Plane(), "");

00136     Light* SceneManager::CreateLight(const String& Name)
00137     {
00138         Light* light = new Light(this->OgreManager->createLight(Name), this);
00139         Lights.push_back(light);
00140         return light;
00141     }
00142 
00143     Light* SceneManager::GetLight(const String& Name)
00144     {
00145         if(Lights.empty())
00146             return 0;
00147         for( std::vector<Light*>::iterator it = Lights.begin() ; it != Lights.end() ; it++ )
00148         {
00149             if( Name == (*it)->GetName() )
00150             {
00151                 return (*it);
00152             }
00153         }
00154         return 0;
00155     }
00156 
00157     Light* SceneManager::GetLight(Whole Index)
00158     {
00159         return Lights[Index];
00160     }
00161 
00162     Whole SceneManager::GetNumLights()
00163     {
00164         return Lights.size();
00165     }
00166 
00167     void SceneManager::DestroyLight(Light* light)
00168     {
00169         if(Lights.empty())
00170             return;
00171         for( std::vector<Light*>::iterator it = Lights.begin() ; it != Lights.end() ; it++ )
00172         {
00173             if( light == (*it) )
00174             {
00175                 delete (*it);
00176                 Lights.erase(it);
00177                 return;
00178             }
00179         }
00180     }

00182     ParticleEffect* SceneManager::CreateParticleEffect(const String& Name, const String& Template)
00183     {
00184         ParticleEffect* Particle = new ParticleEffect(this->OgreManager->createParticleSystem(Name, Template), this);
00185         Particles.push_back(Particle);
00186         return Particle;
00187     }

00192             return 0;
00193         for( std::vector<ParticleEffect*>::iterator it = Particles.begin() ; it != Particles.end() ; it++ )
00194         {
00195             if( Name == (*it)->GetName() )
00196             {
00197                 return (*it);
00198             }
00199         }
00200         return 0;

00213     void SceneManager::DestroyParticleEffect(ParticleEffect* particleeffect)
00214     {
00215         if(Particles.empty())
00216             return;
00217         for( std::vector<ParticleEffect*>::iterator it = Particles.begin() ; it != Particles.end() ; it++ )
00218         {
00219             if( particleeffect == (*it) )
00220             {
00221                 delete (*it);
00222                 Particles.erase(it);
00223                 return;
00224             }
00225         }
00226     }

00229     {

00233     Node* SceneManager::CreateOrbitingNode(const String& Name, Vector3 Target, Vector3 RelativeLoc, bool AutoTrack)
00234     {
00235         Ogre::SceneNode* OgreCNode = OgreManager->createSceneNode(Name + "C");
00236         OgreManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(OgreCNode);
00237         OgreCNode->setPosition(Target.GetOgreVector3());
00238         Ogre::SceneNode* OgreONode = OgreManager->createSceneNode(Name);
00239         OgreCNode->addChild(OgreONode);
00240         OgreONode->setPosition(RelativeLoc.GetOgreVector3());
00241         if(AutoTrack)
00242         {
00243             OgreONode->setAutoTracking(true, OgreCNode);
00244         }
00245         Node* PhysONode = new Node(OgreONode, this);
00246         PhysONode->SetType(Node::Orbit);
00247         Nodes.push_back(PhysONode);
00248         return PhysONode;
00249     }
00250 
00251     Node* SceneManager::CreateStandNode(const String& Name, Vector3 LookAt, Vector3 Location)
00252     {
00253         Ogre::SceneNode* OgreNode = OgreManager->createSceneNode(Name);
00254         OgreManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(OgreNode);
00255         OgreNode->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00256         OgreNode->lookAt(LookAt.GetOgreVector3(), Ogre::Node::TS_WORLD);
00257         Node* PhysNode = new Node(OgreNode, this);
00258         PhysNode->SetType(Node::Stand);
00259         Nodes.push_back(PhysNode);
00260         return PhysNode;
00261     }
00262 
00263     Node* SceneManager::GetNode(const String& Name)
00264     {
00265         if(Nodes.empty())
00266             return 0;
00267         for( std::vector<Node*>::iterator it = Nodes.begin() ; it != Nodes.end() ; it++ )
00268         {
00269             if( Name == (*it)->GetName() )
00270             {
00271                 Node* node = (*it);
00272                 return node;
00273             }
00274         }
00275         return 0;
00276     }
00277 
00278     Node* SceneManager::GetNode(Whole Index)
00279     {
00280         return Nodes[Index];
00281     }
00282 
00283     Whole SceneManager::GetNumNodes()
00284     {
00285         return Nodes.size();
00286     }
00287 
00288     Whole SceneManager::GetNumStandNodes()
00289     {
00290         if(Nodes.empty())
00291             return 0;
00292         Whole Num = 0;
00293         for( std::vector<Node*>::iterator it = Nodes.begin() ; it != Nodes.end() ; it++ )
00294         {
00295             if( Node::Stand == (*it)->GetType() )
00296             {
00297                 Num++;
00298             }
00299         }
00300         return Num;
00301     }
00302 
00303     Whole SceneManager::GetNumOrbitNodes()
00304     {
00305         if(Nodes.empty())
00306             return 0;
00307         Whole Num = 0;
00308         for( std::vector<Node*>::iterator it = Nodes.begin() ; it != Nodes.end() ; it++ )
00309         {
00310             if( Node::Orbit == (*it)->GetType() )
00311             {
00312                 Num++;
00313             }
00314         }
00315         return Num;
00316     }
00317 
00318     void SceneManager::DestroyNode(Node* node)
00319     {
00320         if(Nodes.empty())
00321             return;
00322         for( std::vector<Node*>::iterator it = Nodes.begin() ; it != Nodes.end() ; it++ )
00323         {
00324             if( node == (*it) )
00325             {
00326                 delete (*it);
00327                 Nodes.erase(it);
00328                 return;
00329             }
00330         }
00331     }

00334         { return ManagerBase::SceneManager; }
